Desc.entry: A not-for-profit programme, based on the co-operative model, which provides painting and decorating, any size building work, cleaning, house clearance and removal, flat-pack assembly and gardening services for people with mental or physical disabilities, older people and people with ill health. Offers a disability adaption service where wheelchair ramps can be installed, doors can be widened and staircases prepared for the acceptance of stairlifts. Can adapt patios and driveways to accept wheelchairs, installs spending pens for assistance dogs and other disability compliant aids. Services are charged for at a subsidised or nil rate with the aim of helping the elderly, disabled or ill to live with confidence and independence. Welcomes new programme members. A registered Industrial & Provident Society. Registered in England, registration no 310103R.
